name: Uzumaki
goals: Showcase the natural beauty of polar functions through interaction and play
Recreate the experience of marbles spiraling down a funnel

features.text: Spawn marbles and watch them spiral around
Turn on tracing to draw beautiful patterns
Warp time to change speed and direction
Experiment and witness your own hypnotizing creations

learned: How to integrate JavaScript libraries like p5.js into my projects
How to simulate 3D space in 2D using orthographic projection
How to design interactive animations that mesmerize and pull you in
